version_description:
** We fixed the photo blur problem when selecting photos on iOS 9 in this version.
** Now the most recent photos will be on the top when you choose photos. More convenient.
Please contact feedback@gpowers.net if you have any problems or suggestions.

** Now besides square collages, we support Instagram Landscape and portrait collages as well. You can choose either size to post.
** More free collages to choose from.
** Finger gestures for text edit become more smooth.
** Enhanced background pattern effects.
** Other optimizations.
Please contact us if you have any questions with this version via feedback@gpowers.net

Magic Photo Collage - add Templates entrance!

* We offer two ways to collage: the previous entrance is "Auto Collage" now. And the other new entrance is "Templates" to let you view the grid or magazine templates first and then fill in photos.

* Support 3D touch on iPhone 6S and 6S Plus

* Improved user interface to make you enjoy the app more.

* Well designed templates and magazine effects to inspire you.

Let us know what you think of the new version by rate the app or contact support via feedback@gpowers.net. Your feedback is very important to us.

Thanks for your valuable feedback. Main changes in this version:
1. Now support high-resolution when saving and sharing.
2. Most of the words in the Magazine templates could be edited now.
3. Long press and drag to change the photo's position within the collage.

Other improvements:
More suitable background colors
New fonts added
Problems fixed

1. Fixed the problem that text color change couldn't be saved on magazine template.
2. Fixed the problem that photo position change with the exchange button couldn't be saved.
3. Minor improvements.

Contact us via feedback@gpowers.net if you have any feedback for problems.

We heard your voice about the improvements of the app. Thank you for all the suggestions.

1. Now select multiple photos from album becomes more convenient.
2. Support zoom in/out through both one finger and two fingers. Much easier to use.
3. Performance optimization that fixed the crash problem.
4. More background colors added.
5. Fixed problems on two fonts and several borders.
6. Share to Flickr and Tumblr added.

Contact us if you have any problems or suggestions via feedback@gpowers.net

Many new goodies added in this Version!
-New sticker type with color changing function. Try them to make stunning effects.
-New Patterns and fonts added
-Add Magazines entrance on homepage
-New way to select color and patterns. More convenient.
-Now support Indonesian, Malay and Vietnamese languages

Problems fixed and improvements:
-Fixed the problem that photos from iCloud couldn't be selected if haven't downloaded
-Fixed the problem that some mirror effects on template couldn't be saved
-Fixed the problem that weather information templates couldn't be saved

Enjoy the app！Contact us via feedback@gpowers.net.

Improvements in this version:
1. Performance Optimization. Now crash problem in Auto entrance has been fixed.
2. Display problem on iPhone 4 and iPhone 4S fixed.
3. Sequence problem of imported photos fixed. Now you won't feel photos missing anymore.
4. Share to Facebook problem fixed.
5. Text adding problem on iOS 7 fixed.

Contact us via feedback@gpowers.net. Your suggestions and feedback are always highly appreciated by Magic Photo Collage Team.

This is a big update with a beautiful new user interface and icon.

Other wonderful features:
- More convenient operation flow.
- Add gradient color to backgrounds, texts and artwork stickers.
- Add Natural Lights and Lens Flares filters.
- Add more fonts.
- Add opacity adjustment to texts and artwork stickers.

Enjoy the new version and tell us your thoughts via feedback@gpower.co or leave a review on the App Store.

Thanks for your valuable feedback and support:

Fixed the text save problem
Fixed the Natural Lights and Lens Flares Filter Packs unlock problem after purchasing the Big Bundle.
Fixed the premium background pattern problem.
Overall optimization.

Fixed the save problem on text transparency.
Fixed a problem that might cause filter issue.
Optimize the thumbnail page on Auto entrance, which might cause crash problem.
Other improvements.
Minor problem fixed.

New Magazine Templates, new Borders, new Grids for 7-9 photos, all in this new version!

- Add History on homepage to save your artworks within the app and re-edit them
- Editable magazine watermark for Big Bundle and Remove Ads users
- Now you can view the goodies via category in Shop
- Improved text edit function
- Improved filter performance
- Tested on iOS10
- Other optimizations.

Enjoy Magic Photo Collage! Let us know your thoughts via feedback@gpower.co or leave a review on the App Store.
Fixed a problem

Magic Photo Collage is "Mixoo" now with many fantastic new features:

1. Add Freestyle Collage function. There are no grids or templates here. You choose your photo and do whatever you want: Borders, Background, Crop, Texts, Stickers. It's a great tool to make photo wall.

2. Add holiday magazine templates for Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year and so on.

3. Layout change function for all grids and magazine. You can change templates conveniently on edit page now.

We keep improving the app to let you better create. Enjoy Mixoo and let us know if you have any feedback or problem via feedback@gpower.co

We made some improvements to let you use the app with more joy:

1. Preparation for the more colorful and beautiful holiday templates. Coming soon!
2. Add widgets support for the four entrances and a picture display.
3. Swipe to change the text fonts now. Easier to use.
4. Texts rotation is above the edit box now.
5. Other improvements and problem fixes.

Reach out to us via feedback@gpower.co or @mixoo_app on Instagram. We'd love to hear your voice.

In this version we fixed some problems and add fun stickers:
1. Fixed the Facebook share problem
2. Add two free sticker packs: Bubble and Facial Deco 2. You will love them.
3. Now stickers and texts could be added on top of the Frames
4. Other improvements.

We add some interesting functions for you to better create photo collages.

1. Add many awesome filter packs like Portrait, Vintage, Punk, Dim and so on.
2. Now you can select several stickers at one time. More convenient to use.
3. You can add picture stickers with cropped shapes in all the entrances now. Fun to create interesting photo collages.
4. Optimize the text function.

Let us know if you have any problems via feedback@gpower.co

Mixoo added many new fantastic features and design templates:

1. Layout function with adjustable frames and borders
2. A brand-new camera entrance with beauty and filter effects.
3. A photo edit entrance with editable contrast, warmth, exposure and so on.
4. Added finely-designed templates with themes like Baby, Business, Trending and Love.

We keep improving the app to let you better create. Enjoy Mixoo and let us know if you have any feedback or problem via feedback@gpower.co
Minor problem fixed. Performance Optimization.
Minor problem fixed. Performance Optimization.

We are hearing from you and we gave our best to bring you a better Mixoo.
Better versions are on their way, so stay tuned : )

We are hearing from you and we gave our best to bring you a better Mixoo.

Now there are more free templates for you to use! Enjoy Christmas with Mixoo.

Here's what's new:
- Performance improvement
- Bug fixed
Now there are more free templates for you to use! Enjoy Christmas with Mixoo.

What’s new on Mixoo
- Support iOS 12
- Adapt to iPhone new models
- Fixed minor bugs
- Performance optimization

Hey guys! All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Minor bug fixing and performance improvements, as they call it. Take care!
